title: PermissionError: [Errno 13] Permission denied: '/-'
body:
I'm trying to install `gdal`, which depends on `libjpeg-turbo`. Several of the dependencies successfully install, but when it gets to `libjpeg-turbo`, I get the following error:
```console
$ spack -d install gdal
...
==> Installing libjpeg-turbo
==> Searching for binary cache of libjpeg-turbo
==> Warning: No Spack mirrors are currently configured
==> No binary for libjpeg-turbo found: installing from source
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Users/Adam/spack/bin/spack", line 48, in <module>
    sys.exit(spack.main.main())
  File "/Users/Adam/spack/lib/spack/spack/main.py", line 669, in main
    return _invoke_command(command, parser, args, unknown)
  File "/Users/Adam/spack/lib/spack/spack/main.py", line 440, in _invoke_command
    return_val = command(parser, args)
  File "/Users/Adam/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/install.py", line 318, in install
    install_spec(args, kwargs, abstract, concrete)
  File "/Users/Adam/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/install.py", line 197, in install_spec
    install(spec, kwargs)
  File "/Users/Adam/spack/lib/spack/spack/cmd/install.py", line 186, in install
    spec.package.do_install(**kwargs)
  File "/Users/Adam/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py", line 1402, in do_install
    **kwargs)
  File "/Users/Adam/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py", line 1511, in do_install
    spack.store.layout.create_install_directory(self.spec)
  File "/Users/Adam/spack/lib/spack/spack/directory_layout.py", line 253, in create_install_directory
    mkdirp(spec.prefix, mode=perms)
  File "/Users/Adam/spack/lib/spack/llnl/util/filesystem.py", line 435, in mkdirp
    raise e
  File "/Users/Adam/spack/lib/spack/llnl/util/filesystem.py", line 430, in mkdirp
    os.makedirs(path)
  File "/Users/Adam/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/os.py", line 210, in makedirs
    makedirs(head, mode, exist_ok)
  File "/Users/Adam/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/os.py", line 220, in makedirs
    mkdir(name, mode)
PermissionError: [Errno 13] Permission denied: '/-'
```
If I look inside of `create_install_directory`, for whatever reason, it thinks that `spec.prefix` should be `/-/libjpeg-turbo--achj34aiwnm4nhyogydigq3elywyqwb4`, which causes the permission denied error. If I try to install `libjpeg-turbo` on its own, it successfully installs, but then when I try to install `gdal`, it tries to reinstall `libjpeg-turbo` and encounters the same error message. I've managed to reproduce this problem with both Python 2 and 3. `spack reindex` and `spack clean` didn't help. I'm wondering if this is a bug related to virtual dependencies. Any thoughts?
